scripts.buildtracimlibwindoz: set NODE_ENV=production&& webpack -p && echo /* eslint-disable */ | cat - dist/tracim_frontend_lib.lib.js > temp && mv temp dist/tracim_frontend_lib.lib.js && echo /* eslint-enable */>> dist/tracim_frontend_lib.lib.js && cp ./dist/tracim_frontend_lib.style.js ../frontend/dist/app/
scripts.buildtracimlib-devwindoz: set NODE_ENV=production&& webpack && echo /* eslint-disable */ | cat - dist/tracim_frontend_lib.lib.js > temp && mv temp dist/tracim_frontend_lib.lib.js && echo /* eslint-enable */>> dist/tracim_frontend_lib.lib.js && cp ./dist/tracim_frontend_lib.style.js ../frontend/dist/app/
